text:
Karuna Labs | Software Engineer (Virtual Reality, Fullstack, Backend, SRE) | San Francisco, CA | Onsite | Fulltime | http://karunavr.com

Looking to hire a Unity Developer for a chronic pain Virtual Reality application. We use the Vive Pro and Vive Focus.

- Strong generalist and systems architecture programming skills. - Effective communicator and collaborator with engineers and developers from other disciplines. - A passion for VR game and experience development.

Qualifications: BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering, related degree, or relevant professional experience Experience in working with Unity framework 5.x or higher and the Unity plug-in architecture

Unity development: 2 years

Shoot me an email: lincoln@karunavr.com
